desc.en: e.g., Apex/PUBG/Valorant
desc.zh: Apex/PUBG/Valorant等

desc.en: e.g., Dota2/LOL/Honor of Kings
desc.zh: Dota2/LOL/王者等

desc.en: Focuses more on game immersion and storyline
desc.zh: 更注重游戏沉浸性和故事情节

desc.en: Masterpieces like The Witcher/Elden Ring/Cyberpunk 2077
desc.zh: 巫师/艾尔登法环/2077等大作

name.zh: 沉浸式解谜/精品独立游戏

desc.en: Unique gameplay, art, or narrative that brings a special emotional experience, like Little Nightmares/Undertale/Outer Wilds/Celeste
desc.zh: 玩法、美术或叙事独具匠心，能带来独特情感体验，如小小梦魇/Undertale/星际拓荒/Celeste

name.zh: 战略类游戏的甲级战犯

desc.en: Turn-based (e.g., Civilization) / Real-time (e.g., StarCraft)
desc.zh: 回合制(如文明)/即时制(如星际争霸)

desc.en: Simulation or sandbox games like Oxygen Not Included/Cities: Skylines/Turing Complete/Microsoft Flight Simulator
desc.zh: 缺氧/天际线/图灵完备/模拟飞行等模拟或沙盒

desc.en: Games for local or online play with friends, focusing on fun and interaction, like It Takes Two, Overcooked, Mario Party, Fall Guys
desc.zh: 适合与朋友同屏或联机并主打欢乐互动的游戏，如双人成行、胡闹厨房、马力欧派对、糖豆人

desc.en: Anime, Comics, Games, and ACG culture
desc.zh: 动漫，二次元文化认同

desc.en: Not just watching movies, but loves analyzing, discussing, and reviewing them
desc.zh: 不只看电影，还热爱分析、讨论、影评

desc.en: Addicted to the atmosphere and experience of live music
desc.zh: 沉迷现场音乐的氛围和体验

desc.en: Feels the urge to sing along impromptu, maybe can even play and sing
desc.zh: 听着歌即兴就想唱出来，或许还能弹唱

desc.en: Has a lot of love and affection for pets
desc.zh: 对宠物有很多的爱和亲切感

desc.en: Always in pursuit of fashion and personal style
desc.zh: 始终追求时尚和个人风格

desc.en: Enjoys the fun and sense of accomplishment from cooking
desc.zh: 享受自己动手做饭或烹饪的乐趣和成就感

desc.en: Loves crafts, journaling, knitting, etc.
desc.zh: 喜欢手工、手帐、编织等

desc.en: Loves offline social games like board games, murder mystery games, etc.
desc.zh: 喜欢桌游、剧本杀等线下社交游戏

desc.en: Digital art, watercolor, sketching, manga/comics
desc.zh: 板绘、水彩、速写、漫画

desc.en: Observing the world through a lens, exploring the surprises in street corners and alleys
desc.zh: 从镜头中观察世界，探索街角小巷的惊喜

desc.en: Passionate about food, enthusiastic about discovering and trying various restaurants
desc.zh: 对美食有热情，热衷于发现和品尝各种餐厅

desc.en: Strong interest in programming, digital gadgets, and hardcore technology
desc.zh: 对编程、数码产品、硬核科技有浓厚兴趣

desc.en: Novels, poetry, essays, fan fiction... building worlds and healing oneself with words
desc.zh: 小说、诗歌、随笔、同人文……用文字构建世界和疗愈自身

desc.en: Enthusiastic about learning foreign languages and looking for people to practice with
desc.zh: 热衷于学习外语，并希望与人练习

desc.en: Loves discussing deep topics like social issues, philosophy, and psychology
desc.zh: 喜欢讨论社会议题、哲学、心理学等深度话题
